name: Snorf Industries, (Fun)ctional Hats and Hoodies for Dogs
blurb: Premium apparel for French Bulldogs, English Bulldogs, Pugs, Boston Terriers, & their friends. Designed to be both fun and functional.

name: Dog Pack - Harness & Backpack for Stylish Pups
blurb: Enjoy what your dog's wearing as much as they enjoy their walk! Let them pack their own treats, doggy bags, water, hoodie and toys.

blurb:
Tired of boring out-of-date dog clothes? 
Make your dog stand out with our stylish alpaca dog sweaters!

name: Pawshhtag | Premium Pet ID Tags
blurb: Modern style, quiet, and extremely durable. Pawshhtag dog and cat ID tags are the finest customized pet tags available.

name: Redefining Dog Accessories - Petsochic
blurb:
Petsochic is a luxury modern pet accessory brand. 
We enable you to embroider all your dog products.
Be Chic, Be Creative!

name: "World's First" Air Pollution Mask for Dogs
blurb: Protecting your dog from air pollution one breath at a time. Extreme air protection from smoke, smog, chemicals, dust, and toxins.

name: JES Sustainable Pet Apparel
blurb: Upcycled Pet Products. Made in USA.
